A simple demonstration simulator for the Opponet project

= Introduction =

Opposim is a very simple demonstration for the [OMNETPP OMNeT++] compontents of the Opposim project. The simulation involves only mobility or contact functionality - expanding the simulation to do something useful is completely up to the users.

= Building opposim =

Download, install and build the latest [OMNETPP OMNeT++] and [MobilityFramework Mobility Framework] releases. See the installation and build instructions for the projects for further details.
